name: Tenpai Dragon of Genroku
text: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can Special Summon it as a Tuner, then you can increase its Level by 1. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Tenpai Dragon" monster from your Deck, except "Tenpai Dragon of Genroku" , also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Dragon monsters. You can only use each effect of "Tenpai Dragon of Genroku" once per turn.
